section.p: Some management values need to be computed. These situations frequently arise when custom MBeans are deployed alongside an enterprise application. An MBean named "Accounting" might be deployed within an enterprise application that defines operations intended for operators or support staff. These operations might include methods such as "getBankBalance()" or "countTotalDeposits()".
The zenjmx daemon can invoke operations, but there are some subtleties in how it sends parameters to a JMX Agent, and interprets the response.
